titleStmt.title: Blundel, the Jesuit's letter of intelligence to his friends the Jesuites at Cambray, taken about him when he was apprehended at Lambeth on Monday the 23th of June 1679 to Madam Katherine Hall in Cambray.
titleStmt.author: Blundell, Nicholas, 1640-1680.

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication from Wing.
